cart.title: Shopping Cart

cargador-portatil-01.description: Portable Charger 10000 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: Solid build quality. The 10000 mAh capacity is spot on, charges my iPhone 15 Pro about twice. The built-in cable is a lifesaver.
A bit bulkier than I imagined, but it performs well. Fast charging works perfectly with my Samsung.

cargador-portatil-02.description: Portable Charger 20000 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: Massive capacity! Perfect for long flights or camping trips. I managed to keep my tablet and phone alive for three days.

cargador-portatil-03.description: Portable Charger 4000 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: Super slim and light. It's not for heavy use, but it's the best pocket-sized backup for emergencies.

cargador-portatil-04.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: The LED display is very accurate. Itâ€™s great knowing exactly how much juice is left instead of just guessing with four tiny dots.

cargador-portatil-05.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: I take this everywhere. The urban design looks premium and it fits perfectly in my bag's side pocket. Great everyday carry.

cargador-portatil-06.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: Reliable and simple. It doesn't overheat even when charging at full speed. Best value for the money so far.

cargador-portatil-07.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: Standard power bank. Does what it says on the box. The matte finish is nice because it doesn't show fingerprints.

cargador-portatil-08.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: The transparent aesthetic is stunning. Beyond the looks, the PD charging is fast enough for my MacBook Air. Highly recommended.

cargador-portatil-09.description: Portable Charger 8500 mAh With Mixio Mp-10 Cable
reviews: The build is very sturdy. I've dropped it once and it still works perfectly. Excellent port selection for different cables.
